svg.title: Testcase for style change on foreignObject ancestor
svg.script: document.addEventListener("MozReftestInvalidate", doTest, false); setTimeout(doTest, 4000); // fallback for running outside reftest function doTest() { document.getElementById('g').style.fontSize = '16px'; document.documentElement.removeAttribute('class'); }
